title: Is modern life making us tired?
description: Are artificial lights and late night TV ruining our sleep? Neil and Alice discuss the issue and teach you related vocabulary.

vocabItems.definition: breathing in a noisy way through your mouth or nose while you're asleep
a chemical found in coffee and tea that makes you feel more awake.
having difficulty falling asleep or staying asleep
people who live by hunting animals and gathering plants
(in this context) not spaced out evenly
a treatment for mental health problems that tries to change the way you think
